name: Navin Paprika Hot
description: Paprika Powder is ground from dried sweet peppers the fruits of a tropical evergreen bush. It is milder than chili powder or cayenne. Paprika has bright red color and a mild, sweet flavor with a cardamom aroma. It is a highly versatile spice. Good with eggs, fish, chicken, crab, cheese and more. It can also be used as a garnish on baked potatoes, salads and rice dishes.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
